Class FaithTrack

public class FaithTrack
extends java.lang.Object
Class FaithTrack

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    FaithTrack()
    faith track constructor create popetiles zone by using a json file and initialize the track

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void checkPapalFavor()
    check if pope tiles can be activated this method could be called by faith track of player that activate the papalReport or by controller, to check for all players if they are in activation zone of papal reports
    int getFaithMarkerPoints()
    get faith marker points
    int getFaithMarkerPosition()
    get the position of the faith marker on the faith track

    get pope tiles list

    get tiles state list
    int getVictoryPointsPopeTiles()
    add the victory points assigned by the pope tiles

    move faith marker
